attributes.action: Ensure fair & impartial referendum by providing factual leaflets to all UK homes
attributes.additional_details: To include the re-negotiation terms to the EU, whether these have been accepted and when they will be implemented if the UK stays in. Of particular importance is any agreement reached on immigration. The benefits and detriments of staying in the EU with comments from businesses and banks and any other interested parties. Cost to the British taxpayer if remaining in the EU. How much of our current law is governed by the EU and whether further Parliamentary Sovereignty will be lost if we were to remain in. Informing the British people in this way will ensure the forthcoming referendum is conducted in a fair and impartial manner, allowing true democracy to take place.
attributes.background: The Government to provide factual information leaflets to every householder, putting forward both the positive and negative aspects for remaining in or out of the European Union.
